extendedInfo.description: busuu.com, the leading online community for language learning, brings you the perfect app to learn Spanish on the go:â° In the latest release - Discounted offer to activate all courses! â Extensive vocabulary - over 3,000 words and key phrasesâ From beginner to advanced intermediate levels (A1 - B2)â Covering 150 different topics using day-to-day situationsâ Comprehensive audio-visual learning material with photos and recordings by native speakersâ Sections include vocabulary, dialogues and interactive testsâ No internet connection requiredâ Free version includes 20 complete learning units - full content can be purchased inside the app!â Learning progress can be synchronized with your profile on busuu.com, the famous online community for learning languages with over 15,000,000 usersâ Only language learning app in the world which includes direct interaction with native speakersâ Submit your writing exercises and get corrected by native speakers from our communityâ Enjoy the latest learning contentâ Now also supports Japanese and Mandarin as interface languagesâ New Travel CourseWhat our mobile app users say about us in their reviews:"You can learn at your own pace. Very useful!""Easy to learn and easy to understand""It is a super fun tool where you learn and interact with other people""This application is really great to learn. I love the correction by natives, practising with native speakers for free. Super app""This is better than my Rosetta Stone Spanish! It is more fun and it is free as opposed to the 500 plus dollars I paid for RS. I highly recommend this app!!""The application is simply super, languages are taught like a game! Very helpful comments from other users on your exercises. Bought a Premium package without hesitation!"

reviews.comment: In the past, I used rosetta stone but it doesn\'t work with Ubuntu.  Now this is\tMuch better only access with moble apps and busuu talk excellent.
reviews.author: Tim Pierce

reviews.title: Can\'t even register!
reviews.comment: It logs in with Facebook, but I can\'t enter an email address to complete registration. Or, if I create a new account, it comes up with \"Error 1\" and doesn\'t complete!
reviews.author: Tom Freret

reviews.comment: Excellent app and its free just have to remain committed to learn motivation is the key
reviews.author: micky brown

reviews.title: Cool app but
reviews.comment: ...but i cannot enjoy it 100% because at the writing exercise.. when i try to access the onscreen keyboard... i cant see what im typing.. the keyboard covers the textbox..  Perhaps.. would be a lot better if his app can host screen-rotations right? Coz some device, some tablets for example, have smaller screens than the other tabs/pads...   the UI can look so much better..  :) i wanna see this app\'s progress because the contents are really helpful.  Ps: I love the site\'s training course too.
reviews.author: Javenz Hazael Benitez

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: I judge by retention. It\'s not boring.
reviews.author: Michael Thammora

reviews.comment: I tried several programs and I find this the best\' except for rosetta stone ,due to the method of using images along with the definitions.\tI\'ve also found that it has the best variety of the vocabulary as well as phrases and sentences
